text: Haunting Ground, known in Japan as , is a survival horror video game developed by Capcom and published by Capcom. ==Voice Cast== *Cornelia Hayes Oâ€™Herlihy as Fiona Belli *Moira Quirk as Daniella and Ayla Belli *Greg Ellis as Riccardo and Ugo Belli *Enn Reitel as Old Lorenzo Belli *Robin Atkin Downes as Young Lorenzo Belli *Clement von Franckenstein and Lex Lang as Debilitas == References == Category:2005 video games Category:2000s horror video games Category:Capcom games Category:Gothic video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Rape in video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Survival video games Category:Video games about dogs Category:Video games developed in Japan
